datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to immersive simulations, VR technology, and applications.

columns.name: VR_content_creation
columns.description: The number of VR content items (like games, experiences, or applications) created by the participant per month

columns.name: technology_usage_percent
columns.description: Percentage of daily entertainment time spent using technology

columns.name: digital_comfort
columns.description: Level of comfort with using digital interfaces, from unfamiliar to very comfortable

columns.name: age_group
columns.description: Age group of the individual.

columns.name: leisure_time_reading_books_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of leisure time spent on reading books

columns.name: owns_advanced_VR
columns.description: Indicates ownership of high-end VR devices, enhancing immersive experiences (true) or not (false)

columns.name: social_interaction
columns.description: Preference for social interaction, measured as prefer solitary activities (false) or prefer group activities (true)

columns.name: immersion_rating
columns.description: Subjective rating of how immersive participants find their VR experience

columns.name: leisure_time_immersive_tech_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of leisure time spent on immersive technologies like VR

columns.name: weekend_vr_hours
columns.description: Total hours spent in VR on weekends

columns.name: technology_usage_frequency
columns.description: The frequency of using any technology devices, including computers, smartphones, and other digital devices per week

columns.name: reads_tech_articles
columns.description: Indicates whether the participant regularly reads technology-related articles

columns.name: daily_computer_usage_hours
columns.description: Number of hours a participant uses a computer each day

columns.name: derived_stress_level
columns.description: Factor related to stress level derived from the dataset

columns.name: owned_interactive_devices
columns.description: Number of interactive devices owned by the participant

columns.name: number_of_tech_devices_owned
columns.description: Number of different technology devices an individual owns

columns.name: physical_activity_frequency
columns.description: Frequency of engagement in physical activities per week

columns.name: technical_training_level
columns.description: The individual's level of formal training related to virtual technology, rated from novice to expert.

columns.name: motion_sickness_experience
columns.description: Whether the participant often experiences motion sickness in VR

columns.name: vr_usage_duration
columns.description: Duration of VR usage in minutes

columns.name: frequent_equipment_updates
columns.description: Whether the individual updates their VR equipment frequently (at least once a year).

columns.name: VR_interest_level
columns.description: A rating of how interested the participant is in VR technology, from not interested to highly interested

columns.name: graphic_preference
columns.description: Indicates if the participant prefers realistic graphics in VR (1 for yes, 0 for no)

columns.name: has_gaming_experience
columns.description: Whether the participant has experience with video games

columns.name: gender
columns.description: Gender of the participant

columns.name: uses_tech_for_leisure
columns.description: Indicates if the individual uses technology devices for leisure purposes like gaming

columns.name: VR_community_belonging
columns.description: Participant's sense of belonging to the VR community, rated on a scale

columns.name: VR_accessibility
columns.description: Binary value where 1 represents high accessibility to VR equipment and facilities, and 0 represents low accessibility

columns.name: gaming_frequency
columns.description: How often the participant plays video games

columns.name: vr_technology_familiarity
columns.description: Score on the familiarity with VR technology

columns.name: top_tech_user
columns.description: Indicates whether the individual is in the top 25th percentile of technology users

columns.name: tech_meetup_attendance
columns.description: Number of tech-related meetups attended per year

columns.name: technical_job_experience
columns.description: Number of years working in a technical field

columns.name: number_of_languages_spoken
columns.description: Total number of languages spoken by the participant

columns.name: VR_gaming_frequency
columns.description: The frequency of playing virtual reality games per week

columns.name: education_app_satisfaction
columns.description: Satisfaction level with VR educational applications

columns.name: has_young_children
columns.description: Whether the participant has young children under the age of 6

columns.name: cognitive_task_frequency
columns.description: Frequency of engaging in cognitive demanding tasks per week

queries.question: Is there a significant correlation between participants' VR interest level, engagement in VR content creation, sense of belonging to VR community, accessibility to VR technology, and frequency of technology usage throughout the week?
